content: by janet harvey this hat is worked from the brim up seamlessly the knit lines on the main body of the hat flow from the brim ribbing up to the crown where they finish at a point the hat is unisex and suitable for babies up to large adult this design is suitable for wool or wool blend yarns in worsted or aran weight gauge abbreviations 19 sts x 26 rounds = 10cm or 4 inches in st/s -
